00029 inline DbjErrorCode DbjGetTransactionId(TransactionId &transactionId)
00030 {
00031     static const DbjComponent componentId = Support;
00032     DBJ_TRACE_ENTRY();
00033     transactionId = getpid();
00034     DBJ_TRACE_NUMBER(1, "Transaction ID", transactionId);
00035     return DbjGetErrorCode();
00036 }
